Faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
Faq.description: Find answers to common questions about our legal services and processes. If you can't find what you're looking for, don't hesitate to contact us.

Faqs.question: What services do you offer?
Faqs.answer: We provide access to qualified lawyers for consultations, legal advice, document review, and representation in various legal matters such as criminal, family, corporate, and more.

Faqs.question: How do I book a lawyer?
Faqs.answer: Simply enter your legal issue, and we'll match you with a qualified lawyer available in your area. You can then schedule a consultation at your convenience.

Faqs.question: How much does it cost to consult a lawyer?
Faqs.answer: The consultation fees depend on the lawyer’s expertise and the nature of the case. You will be provided with an estimate before you book a session.

Faqs.question: Is the consultation private and confidential?
Faqs.answer: Yes, all your information and conversations with our lawyers are strictly confidential, protected by attorney-client privilege.

Faqs.question: How do I know if the lawyer is qualified?
Faqs.answer: We only work with certified and experienced lawyers who specialize in various legal fields. Each lawyer's credentials are verified before they can offer services through our platform.

Faqs.question: Can I get legal advice online?
Faqs.answer: Yes! You can chat with a lawyer online or book a video consultation. We make it convenient for you to access legal help remotely.

Faqs.question: Can I change my lawyer if I’m not satisfied?
Faqs.answer: Yes (we consider lawyer feedback as well), you can request a different lawyer if you feel that your current lawyer is not the right fit. We’ll assist you in making a new match.

Faqs.question: What types of legal issues can I get help with?
Faqs.answer: You can get legal help for a wide variety of issues, including family law, criminal law, business disputes, property law, employment law, and more.

Faqs.question: How do I make payment for services?
Faqs.answer: Payments are processed securely through our website. You can pay via credit/debit card or other online payment methods like UPI.

Faqs.question: How long will it take to get a response from a lawyer?
Faqs.answer: Once you submit your query, you will be matched with a lawyer in real time. Typically, you will receive a response within two hours, depending on availability.

Faqs.question: Are the lawyers available 24/7?
Faqs.answer: While not all lawyers are available 24/7 (depends on Jurisdiction and police station limits), our platform provides access to lawyers at different hours, ensuring you can get legal help when you need it most.

Faqs.question: Can I get help with document drafting or contract review?
Faqs.answer: Yes! We offer services like document review, contract drafting, and legal writing. You can send your documents for review or consult a lawyer for guidance.

Faqs.question: Do you offer services for businesses?
Faqs.answer: Absolutely! We offer services tailored to businesses, such as corporate legal advice, contract management, and dispute resolution.

Faqs.question: Is there a minimum consultation fee?
Faqs.answer: Consultation fees vary based on the lawyer and the nature of the legal issue. However, we ensure that the pricing is transparent and competitive.

Faqs.question: How do I cancel or reschedule an appointment?
Faqs.answer: You can easily cancel or reschedule your consultation through our platform. Just visit your booking details and make the necessary changes.

Faqs.question: Can I get a lawyer for court representation?
Faqs.answer: Yes (NOC required), many of our lawyers offer representation in court. Simply book a consultation, and we'll help you find a lawyer suited for court appearances.

Faqs.question: How do I know if I need a lawyer?
Faqs.answer: If you're unsure whether you need a lawyer, feel free to chat with one of our experts. They'll help you assess whether legal assistance is necessary.

Faqs.question: Do you have lawyers for international legal matters?
Faqs.answer: Yes (limited), we work with lawyers who specialize in international law and can assist you with cross-border legal issues.
